Question Sentence: ...machst du das? (Why are you doing that?)
...lange bleibst du? (How long are you staying?)
...viele Sprachen sprichst du? (How many languages do you speak?)
...Buch liest du? (Which book are you reading?)
...ist dein Lieblingsfilm? (Which is your favorite movie?)
...heißt dein Lehrer? (What is your teacher's name?)
...kommst du zur Schule? (How do you get to school?)
...fährst du in den Urlaub? (When are you going on vacation?)
...lange dauert der Film? (How long does the movie last?)
...viele Geschwister hast du? (How many siblings do you have?)
...hast du das gemacht? (Why did you do that?)
...geht es dir heute? (How are you today?)
...beginnt der Unterricht? (When does the class start?)
